post.body: oops! Twitter was all wonky this week and I just got your message about the form. Did you get it turned in ok? if not, DM me.
thanks for the link! http://tinyurl.com/6gxx2s
Thanks for the blog post! http://snurl.com/2gwl7
Thanks Derek! I especially like the "interesting social commentary" bit. Very cool!
Hey thanks for tweeting about Emoodicon! Can you help us get the word out about the make a face contest?
what's TAT?
because faces are often hard to read. And because it's a fun idea.
Emoodicon nail art seen at #Blogher08 http://snurl.com/31cgd
Melanie posted our rings on Ooh! Shiney! http://ooh-shiny.net/?p=5151 Thanks, Mel!
New lower prices for Emoodicon! http://tinyurl.com/58neoe
Just redid the Emoodicon Myspace page to add new pics, a twitter widget, etc: http://www.myspace.com/emoodicon
Our contest just got easier and quicker: Get a free ring (if you win) here: http://snurl.com/2hdqt
Derek E. Baird at Barking Robot Blog digs Emoodicon: http://snurl.com/2fp6e Thanks, Derek!
Make a Funny Face photo contest: http://tinyurl.com/6gq2ms We need more entries!
Win a free ring! Send us one photo of yourself making a face like an emoticon. Contest here: http://tinyurl.com/2uyqp3 Odds are good still!
Want a chance to win a free ring? Send us one photo of yourself making a face like an emoticon. Contest here: http://tinyurl.com/2uyqp3
Also posted new entry in our "make a funny face" contest: http://tinyurl.com/6gq2ms we really need more entries!
Added the tee shirt store to the blog officially today: http://tinyurl.com/6ra67c
Now you can get Bleep the Robot Emoodicons on apparel and swag at CafePress! http://www.cafepress.com/emoodicon more designs coming soon!
I am so happy with the new copy on the front pag of emoodicon! Any thoughts, anyone? http://www.emoodicon.com/welcome.html
